004package kut;
005
006import java.util.ArrayList;
007import java.util.Random;
008import java.util.Locale;
009import java.text.Collator;
010import java.io.BufferedReader;
011import java.io.InputStreamReader;
012import java.io.IOException;
013
014/** System utilities */
015public class Sys {
016  Sys () {}
017
018  /** Default colator used by Str */
019  protected static Collator collator = Collator.getInstance();
020
021  /** User name. */
022  public static String user = System.getProperty("user.name");
023
024  /**
025   * Executes an external program.
026   * @param params Parameters to call the external program.
027   * @return Rs.ok With the response of the external program, or Rs.error
028   *         if an error happened.
029   */
030  public static Rs<String> cmd (String... params) {
031    Tp<String, String> r = cmd2(params);
032    return r.e2.equals("")
033      ? Rs.ok(r.e1)
034      : Rs.error(r.e2)
035    ;
036  }
037
038  /**
039   * Executes an external program.
040   * @param params Parameters to call the external program.
041   * @return tp.e1 with the standard out and tp.e2 with the error out.
042   */
043  public static Tp<String, String> cmd2 (String... params) {
044    try {
045      Process pr = Runtime.getRuntime().exec(params);
046      try (BufferedReader out = pr.inputReader()) {
047      try (BufferedReader err = pr.errorReader()) {
048        pr.waitFor();
049
050        ArrayList<String> outS = new ArrayList<>();
051        String l = out.readLine();
052        while (l != null) {
053          outS.add(l);
054          l = out.readLine();
055        }
056
057        ArrayList<String> errS = new ArrayList<>();
058        l = err.readLine();
059        while (l != null) {
060          errS.add(l);
061          l = err.readLine();
062        }
063
064        return new Tp<>(Arr.join(outS, "\n"), Arr.join(errS, "\n"));
065      }}
066    } catch (InterruptedException | IOException e) {
067      return new Tp<>("", e.getMessage());
068    }
069  }
070
071  /**
072   * Display 'os' by the stadard error out.
073   * @param os Elements to display.
074   */
075  public static void error (Object... os) {
076    for (Object o: os) System.err.print(o);
077    System.err.println();
078  }
079
080  /**
081   * Return the default Locale.
082   * @return The default Locale.
083   */
084  public static Locale getLocale () {
085    return Locale.getDefault();
086  }
087
088  /**
089   * Display 'os'.
090   * @param os Elements to display.
091   */
092  public static void print (Object... os) {
093    for (Object o: os) System.out.print(o);
094  }
095
096  /**
097   * Display 'os' and then a line feed.
098   * @param os Elements to display.
099   */
100  public static void println (Object... os) {
101    for (Object o: os) System.out.print(o);
102    System.out.println();
103  }
104
105  /**
106   * Reads a line from console.
107   * @return String
108   */
109  public static String readLine () {
110    return System.console().readLine();
111  }
112
113  /**
114   * Sets the default Locale and update the default collator.
115   * @param lc Locale description ('es_ES', 'en', etc.)
116   */
117  public static void setLocale (String lc) {
118    Locale.setDefault(new Locale(lc));
119    collator = Collator.getInstance();
120  }
121
122  /**
123   * Sets the default Locale and update the default collator.
124   * @param lc Locale
125   */
126  public static void setLocale (Locale lc) {
127    Locale.setDefault(lc);
128    collator = Collator.getInstance();
129  }
130
131  /**
132   * Stop the current thread.
133   * @param millis Milliseconds to stop.
134   */
135  public static void sleep (long millis) {
136    try {
137      Thread.sleep(millis);
138    } catch (InterruptedException e) {
139      throw new IllegalArgumentException(e);
140    }
141  }
142
143  /**
144   * Display 'os' and its position in program.
145   * @param os Elements to display.
146   */
147  public static void trace (Object... os) {
148    try {
149      throw new Exception("");
150    } catch (Exception e) {
151      System.out.print(e.getStackTrace()[1] + ": ");
152      println(os);
153    }
154  }
155
156}
